Package index

All functions

addRunRange()
Add Run and Range values to a field experiment plots
collect_corners()
Collect corners of a raster
cornersData
A data frame containing 4 XY coordinates and a id variable
corners_to_plots()
Generating plots from four corner points
deg_2_rad()
Convert degrees to radians
expand_points()
Expand points
extract_plots_from_rasters()
Extract individual plots photos from raster
make_plots()
Make plots from points i.e. plot centers or use to adjust length and the width of plots in an existing plot layout
make_split_plots()
Create split plot centers
moveAllPlots()
Move all plots
movePlotRanges()
Move ranges in your field experiment horizontally or vertically
movePlotRuns()
Move runs in your field experiment horizontally or vertically
multicorners_to_4corners()
Multi-corner points to 4 corner points
rad_2_deg()
radian to degree
read_input_dat()
Read input data
rot_angle()
Orientation of field experiment layout
rot_plots()
Rotate entire experiment or individual plots on its center
rot_shape()
Rotate an entire sf object
wgs84_to_unitM()
Converting coordinate to a unit M CRS
write_output_obj()
Write outputs
